text: Realitatea Plus (meaning "The Reality Plus") is an all-news channel launched in 1 November 2019 that take the place of Realitatea TV. Its owners are Romanian politician Cozmin Guşă and businessman Maricel Păcuraru. ==History== Realitatea Plus was launched on 1 November 2019 replacing the defunct all-news channel Realitatea TV. == References == == External links == * Official Site Category:Television stations in Romania Category:Television channels and stations established in 2001 Category:24-hour television news channels in Romania Category:Romanian news websites
title: Realitatea Plus
